tool.name: Sample from image dataset
tool.description: Returns an image dataset built from the input dataset with the desired number of images

param.name: dataset
param.label: Image dataset to be sample from

param.name: numimages
param.label: Number of images to be sampled

tool.help:
**Description**
Samples from an image dataset to create another, smaller dataset.
-----
**Output**
- An image dataset.
